item.title: Two Gen Zers turned down millions from Elon Musk to build an AI based on the human brain—and it’s outperformed models from OpenAI and Anthropic
item.description: William Chen and Guan Wang believe they will be the first ones to build artificial general intelligence.

item.title: I went to COP30—and saw how the rest of the world is pushing climate action even as the U.S. steps back
item.description: Amid the diplomatic gridlock, perhaps the real story of COP30 was happening outside the negotiation halls.

item.title: Europe’s most popular sign of Christmas is a star that’s been handmade for over 180 years by one of the world’s oldest Protestant denominations
item.description: You already know the Moravian Star, even if you don't know where it's from or why it looks so distinctively beautiful.
